fi.protonode.reloadingkeystore

Class ReloadingPemFileKeyStoreSpi

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.security.KeyStoreSpi
      • fi.protonode.reloadingkeystore.DelegatingKeyStoreSpi
        • fi.protonode.reloadingkeystore.ReloadingPemFileKeyStoreSpi

  • public class ReloadingPemFileKeyStoreSpi
extends DelegatingKeyStoreSpi
    KeyStoreSpi implementation that hot-reloads certificates and private keys from PEM files when the backing files change.
